dmca.title: [Ticket#2007020710003084] DMCA Complaint from Sony for ritebuys.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 12:35 PM
To: Legal Response; sales@ritebuys.com
Subject: RE: [Ticket#2007020710003084] DMCA Complaint from Sony for
ritebuys.com

To Whom It May Concern:

In order to comply fully with the DMCA, all of the URLs containing Sony
Home Video's intellectual property need to be removed.  The remaining
infringing URLs are as follows:

http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=14297&section=

The text describing the Sony product is considered intellectual property
of Sony.  Please email me when this is corrected so that I may issue a
letter closing this case.  Thank you.


Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: Notifications [mailto:notifcations@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2007 5:18 PM
To: Victor Tarver
Subject: Re: [Ticket#2007020710003084] DMCA Complaint from Sony for
ritebuys.com


---- Forwarded message from legal-response@theplanet.com ---

From: legal-response@theplanet.com
To: notifications@netenforcers.com, copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Sony for ritebuys.com
Date: 2007-02-07 23:10:02

> To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
> 
> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
> 
> 
> 
> ---------
> 
> 
> __________________
> 
> From: Notifications [mailto:notifications@netenforcers.com] 
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2007 9:45 AM
> To: Copyright
> Subject: DMCA -ISP - ritebuys.com/Sony Home Video
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> 2/5/2007 
> 
> copyright@theplanet.com
> 
> RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED
> 
> ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
> 
> George Poletes
> 
> 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
> 
> Dallas TX 75207
> 
> Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials
> 
> Dear Designated Agent:
> 
> We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact
you with
> respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted
materials.
> 
> 
> Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and
enforcement
> of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other
> copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist
with
> this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. ?? 512 (c) (3) (A) and 15 U.S.C. ??
1125(a)
> and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that
your
> client, ritebuys.com, at the URL www.ritebuys.com, is using Sony
trademarks
> and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its
agents, or the
> law, specifically with respect to Home Video products sold by Sony's
Personal
> Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the
information
> contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
Net
> Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony.
> 
> The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be
infringed
> or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing
Material") are
> copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of
copyrighted
> images by ritebuys.com are listed below this paragraph.
> 
> http://www.ritebuys.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=14297&section=
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> There are various additional locations of infringement on
www.ritebuys.com
> website. The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all
> infringements need to be addressed.
> 
>  
> 
> Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. ?? 512(c) (1)
(C), Sony
> hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing
Material in
> an expeditious manner. 
> 
>  
> 
> If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers' Compliance
Management
> Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
> Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communications should be
in
> writing. Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this
matter
> with you. Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply
refer the
> matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or
representation does
> not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 2/15/2007, we
will
> assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed
accordingly.
> 
> Sincerely,
> 
> VCLM Law
> 
> Lance C. Venable
> 
> Attorney at Law
> 
> LCV/roc
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> Compliance Management
> 
> Net Enforcers, Inc
> 
> Compliance.management@netenforcers.com
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> ReadNotify.com E-mail Posting-Time Digital Certificate.   On Mon, 05
Feb 2007
> 15:43:08 GMT
>
<http://www.ReadNotify.com/timezone.asp?zone=&when=Mon,%2005%20Feb%20200
7%2015:43:08%20GMT>

and
> ReadNotify reference 5f3935196638663b6168c54004223368, digitally
signed, and
> immediately dispatched. NB: This certificate irrevocably links the
body and
> headers of this email to the date and time they were dispatched. The
following
> signature is now published online; to view it, verify it, or for more
> information, please visit www.ReadNotify.com

<http://www.readnotify.com/readnotify/postcert.asp/5639466.htm#5639466>
